=== Current Issues ===

* Breezy Badger: Default kernel doesn't boot.
* Dapper Drake: 8 floppy drives are detected.
* Feisty Fawn: Work correctly (with 256MB SDRAM)

=== Hardware details ===

* IBM Thinkpad T23 Type 2647
* Pentium III 1.0GHz
* 128MB SDRAM PC133
* 20GB HD 4200rpm / 30GB HD 
* S3 Super Savage IX/C with 16 MB
* DVD-ROM/CD-RW Combo drive
* 14.1 inches TFT 1024x768 screen
* Ambit (Lucent) Softmodem
* Intel Pro/100 Lan
* Spanish Keyboard / Dutch Keyboard

==== Notes ====

* Working OK on Ubuntu 5.04. It didn't boot most of the time on 5.10
* Ubuntu 6.04 detects 8 floppy drives on the Thinkpad!
* Ubuntu 7.04 is the best for this notebook (but with 256MB or more SDRAM)
